mapper.select: SELECT id_brw, id_lib_brw, book_held_id, b.title_book, id_member_brw, m.name, m.phone, start_date_brw, end_date_brw FROM borrow r INNER JOIN book_held h ON r.book_held_id = h.id INNER JOIN book b ON b.id_book = h.book_id_book INNER JOIN member m ON r.id_member_brw = m.id WHERE id_lib_brw = #{idLibBrw} AND end_date_brw is NULL ORDER BY start_date_brw ASC
